channel.title: Portfolios on Eleanor Noble
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Eleanor Noble

item.title: URBAN GIS: NORTHSIDE ACHIEVEMENT ZONE
item.description: In the spring of 2017 I took an Urban GIS course that partnered with the Northside Achievement Zone (NAZ). I worked in the Housing Stability group and focused on gentrification susceptibility, evictions, and shifting homeownership patterns.

item.title: Name of the work 3
item.description:
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)
library(rgdal)

m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=174.768, lat=-36.852, popup="The birthplace of R")
m  # Print the map

states <- readOGR("./cb_2013_us_state_20m/cb_2013_us_state_20m.shp",
  layer = "cb_2013_us_state_20m", GDAL1_integer64_policy = TRUE)
neStates <- subset(states, states$STUSPS %in% c(
  "CT","ME","MA","NH","RI","VT","NY","NJ","PA"
))

leaflet(neStates) %>%
  addPolygons(color = "#444444", weight = 1, smoothFactor = 0.5,
    opacity = 1.0, fillOpacity = 0.5,
    fillColor = ~colorQuantile("YlOrRd", ALAND)(ALAND),
    highlightOptions = highlightOptions(color = "white", weight = 2,
      bringToFront = TRUE))

m

Fifth abundantly made Give sixth hath. Cattle creature i be don’t them.

item.title: Item without image
item.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: Name of the work 1
item.description: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life. One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.
